rukus.text: scripture vers proviz komplet detal Arabic Quran popol kon
bearer bon news ankaux as warner. plej de them turn ili ne auxd
Ili dir Our mens est far up our orel est surd al your message barrier separates us el vi! Do ki vi want kaj tial vol ni
dir mi est ne plur than human est vi inspir ke your di est 1 di. Vi est devoted al Him pet His forgiveness! Ve al idol worshipers
Who ne don obligatory charity (Zakat) regard Hereafter ili est disbelievers
As por those kred plumb righteous life ili ricev put ind recompense
